title: How Microsoft Edge Is Replacing React With Web Components
author: Richard MacManus
description: Microsoft's Edge browser team is on a mission to swap out React UI components with native web platform components. We speak to the team lead.
cntitle: 微软 Edge 如何用 Web Components 替换 React
cndescription: 微软的 Edge 浏览器团队正在努力用原生 Web 平台组件替换 React UI 组件。我们与团队负责人进行了交谈。
